name: Dionysus
short_description:
Dionysus is a Java application originally written to meet the needs of a student pub. It can produce tickets, manage inventory for different articles and manage user accounts used to keep track of delayed payments ('slate').
It can suit the needs of small shops selling a limited number of products and which do not require advanced features.

Please note that this is alpha-quality software! Some of the bugs known so far are listed in the project wiki.
summary: A pub management application, with stock management and user accounts
